XWalther, Hans. Initia carmina ac versuum medii aevi posterioris latinorum. Göttingen, 1959; 2nd ed. 1969, no. 18059.
_description: Avoid bad company — two couplets translating ‘Siu Venerem vitare velis loca tempora fuge / Si venis tempora venit si fugis tempora fugit’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝif þu wilt flen lecherieFle time & stede &
                    cumpanieȝif þu fle senne folwith nouthȝif þu
                    vnbide sche comth vnsouth

Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 21.
